content: I'm a listing manager for a staking platform I'm looking for people to work for me, getting projects to be listed in our pool I pay 20% of the amount I receive varies a lot according to the value pool interested call telegram @Hold02Its a web3 DeFi Platform Mainly focused on providing on demand stakingIts a web3 DeFi Platform Yes, I'm going to send you our ad proposal, you can take a look, I think it will be better for you to understandhttps://imgur.com/a/n7u4zc6For example each staking pool you bring in from a project that wanna share their token as  a reward  for active stakers you can earn up to 20% on fee from all stakersSo imagine 1000 people stake in a pool you bring in you earn deposit d Fees over all those deposits from these 1000 peopleWe have had pools in which the earned fee was more then $50,000I receive 20% I will also pay you 20% of the amount I receive If you imagine that you earn up to 20% it would be from 1500$ to 2000$Telegram Contact Hold02
